title: CHICKEN IN OYSTER SAUCE WITH WATER CHESTNUTS & SPRING ONIONS
directions: Score the chicken pieces and marinate in soya, chilli sauces and pepper for 3-4 hours.

Heat oil. Add the green chillies. Stir and put the chicken pieces. Cook at low heat. After 10 minutes add lemon grass. Once the chicken is cooked well add the oyster sauce. Cook for 1-2 minutes. Add 2-3 tbsp water if required. Add the golden syrup, chilli flakes, water chestnuts and spring onions reserving some for garnish. Mix well and saut√© for a minute. Serve garnished with spring onions and coriander.
